item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Turning my brand’s vision into engaging social media content that converts into real clients and followers. I am seeking a Social Media Manager/Strategist with a proven record on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube. I need someone to post my videos five days a week to captivate and engage, drive conversions through a funnel that must be created. Here's what I am looking for:

1. Designing visually appealing reels, stories (45 seconds to 1 minute) with Cupcut and Canva that resonate with my audience. Utilize this video and content across all platforms.
2. Instagram Marketing: Maximizing impact with strategies and content that captivate on Instagram.
3. TikTok Marketing: Maximizing impact with strategies and content that captivate on TikTok.
4. Facebook Marketing: Similar strategies as above.
5. Content Writing & Copywriting: Crafting compelling copy that engages and converts across all platforms.
6. Social Media Strategy: Developing strategies that align with your goals for a cohesive online presence.
7. Short-Form Video Editing: Optimizing Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, TikToks with the latest trends for virality.
8. YouTube Management and Twitter/X (optional but beneficial): Optimizing profiles and creating engaging content to boost organic traffic and drive sales.
9. LinkedIn Management: Optimizing profiles and content to boost industry authority and enhance networking for an impactful presence.

I require shorts, TikTok and Instagram Reels, Facebook, LinkedIn, and possibly Twitter/X content five days a week. My budget is $300 per week with a 10% marketing bonus every month from every sale that does not involve my current 35 participants. After three months, we can renegotiate the marketing bonuses if the business continues to grow and expand. This is a genuine opportunity for both you and the company to thrive.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 20, 2024 03:10 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Advertising Management, Content Marketing Strategy, Marketing Analytics, Community Engagement, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Instagram Story
Skills: Advertising Management, Content Marketing Strategy, Marketing Analytics, Community Engagement, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Instagram Story
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Presentation Creation - someone to recreate Keynote presentations from existing lecture videos - Upwork
item.description:
Watch this instructional video illustrating the job FIRST before applying: https://www.loom.com/share/7aa97972ebd34f5bb0875ec345ddc16f?sid=c1007988-9783-49bb-b181-c5fb3c7d1377

We are looking for a skilled professional to recreate one of our competitors lecture videos and transform them into informative and engaging Apple Keynote presentation slides. These presentation slides will be used as visual aids in our educational loom videos that we'd like to recreate.

Note: the video topics are all about "health, nutrition, and exercise".

The ideal candidate should have experience in powerpoint or keynote, basic video editing, presentation design, and content creation. Attention to detail and the ability to convey these concepts in a visually appealing manner for us to re-use for our clients are essential. If you have a knack for storytelling and can seamlessly integrate visuals, animations, and text, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Powerpoint presentation creation
- Basic Video editing (preferred)
- Keynote presentation creation
- Content creation
- Visual storytelling
- Animation design

Here is the example presentation I have already recreated (I want you to recreate all other presentations like this): https://www.loom.com/share/3562137b784f4bdd9a2b4bb0a3d1d7f9?sid=7d015ca8-4dd8-42d7-b5da-61e223dae87c

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 20, 2024 03:06 UTC
Category: Presentation Design
Skills:Keynote, Presentation Design, Graphic Design, Microsoft PowerPoint, Business Presentation
Skills: Keynote, Presentation Design, Graphic Design, Microsoft PowerPoint, Business Presentation
Country: AUS
click to apply

item.description:

item.title: Create 10 Cooking Videos / Cooking Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
I am seeking a creative and skilled Cooking Video Content Creator to join my team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for planning, producing, and editing engaging cooking videos for our audience. This role requires a passion for cooking, strong attention to detail, and the ability to present recipes in a clear and appealing manner. They will provide 10 Videos per project within 10-14 days.

Responsibilities:

-Select and prepare recipes suitable for our target audience.
-Plan and script video content, including step-by-step instructions and tips.
-Ensure all ingredients and tools are ready and organized.
-Set up and manage lighting and camera equipment for optimal video quality.
-Record clear and engaging audio instructions, including voiceovers.* When requested otherwise music background.
-Edit videos to remove unnecessary parts, add text overlays, and apply transitions.
-Present finished dishes attractively (*conduct taste tests when required).
-Encourage viewer interaction and respond to comments.
-Optimize videos for various platforms with appropriate keywords, tags, and descriptions.
-Create attractive thumbnails and catchy titles to increase viewership.

Requirements:

-Proven experience in video production, particularly in the culinary field.
-Strong culinary skills and knowledge of various recipes and cooking techniques.
-Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).
-Excellent communication skills and a personable, engaging on-camera presence.
-Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.
-High attention to detail and a commitment to producing high-quality content.

Preferred Qualifications:

-Experience with SEO and social media optimization.
-Familiarity with different camera equipment and lighting setups.
-A portfolio showcasing previous cooking videos or related content.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio or examples of your previous cooking video work.

Join me in creating delicious and engaging content that will inspire and delight the audience!

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 20, 2024 02:45 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: MYS
click to apply

item.title: Marketing Ecommerce Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Marketing Ecommerce Assistant to join our team.  Looking for someone who is reliable, honest, willing to learn and fun to work with.

Jobs will include:
Graphic design using Canva - examples and templates will be provided.
Basic video editing for short form video for Reels/Tik Tok
Uploading products/blog post to Shopify - full training provided but experience using Shopify is needed
Using AI to generate content.
Customer support


Looking for someone that is available for 2 hours every day Monday to Friday. We can be flexible around family needs but would like to agree on a 2 hour time block that works for both us that is close to Australian business working time.

To apply at the beginning at your application please outline three things you like to do in your spare time.



Hourly Range: $6.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 02:37 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Marketing Strategy
Country: Australia
click to apply
